shrines.name: Charge Shrine
shrines.description: Stand nearby to charge. Offers 3 random stat upgrades when activated. Choose one.
shrines.activation: Stand near for several seconds to charge
synergies_items: Beacon (+2 extra shrines, converts to healing zones)
shrines.strategy: Prioritize based on build. Damage/Crit for offense, HP/Armor for defense, XP/Luck early game.
shrines.notes: Can be recharged multiple times. Rewards are random each time.

shrines.name: Golden Charge Shrine
shrines.description: Rare variant. Offers 3 LEGENDARY stat upgrades instead of random rarity.
shrines.activation: Stand near to charge (same as normal)
shrines.strategy: Always prioritize! Legendary upgrades are significantly stronger.
shrines.notes: Rare spawn. Much more powerful than normal charge shrines.

shrines.name: Challenge Shrine
shrines.description: Spawns strong enemies. Clear them for loot rewards.
shrines.strategy: Take when strong enough. Good loot rewards. Skip if struggling.
shrines.notes: Combat challenge. Difficulty scales with game difficulty.

shrines.name: Shrine of Succ
shrines.description: Instantly pulls ALL XP on the ground to you.
shrines.reward: Collects all XP gems on screen
shrines.strategy: Use after large enemy groups. Saves time running around.
shrines.notes: Required for Attraction Tome unlock (use 8 times). Sucky Magnet item auto-does this.

shrines.name: Boss Curse Shrine (Bloody Shrine)
shrines.description: Adds +1 copy of each boss to your fight. Boss HP scales slightly. Extra chest if you win.
shrines.strategy: Only use if confident. Extra boss = much harder fight. Extra chest = worth it.
shrines.notes: High risk, high reward. Test your build strength.

shrines.name: Greed Shrine
shrines.description: Exchanges difficulty increase for money. +5% difficulty per use.
shrines.strategy: Use if build can handle +5% difficulty. More gold = more shop items.
shrines.notes: Difficulty stacks. Be careful not to over-use. +5% per activation.

shrines.name: Moai Shrine (üóø)
shrines.description: Grants free power-up and items of varying rarities.
shrines.strategy: Always take! Free power-up and items. No downside.

shrines.name: Bandit Statue
shrines.description: Desert-only. Summons Bandit boss fight immediately.
shrines.strategy: First time: unlock Bandit character. Afterwards: optional boss fight for loot.
shrines.notes: Desert exclusive. Starts boss fight immediately.

general_tips: Wrench item: +4% faster charging, +7.5% better rewards
Beacon item: Converts charge shrines to healing zones + spawns 2 extra
Golden Charge Shrines are ALWAYS worth it - legendary upgrades
Don't spam Greed Shrines - difficulty stacks quickly
Boss Curse only if you're confident - doubles boss difficulty
Shrine of Succ is required for Attraction Tome unlock (use 8 times)
